title: Alzheimer's Disease Risk Variants Interact with Amyloid-Beta to Modulate Monocyte Function.
abstract: While genetics implicate a central role for dysregulated innate immunity in Alzheimer's disease (AD), the contributions of peripheral myeloid cells, such as monocytes, have been largely overlooked in favor of microglia. Here, we investigate whether AD-associated loci, specifically
